Where the semantic web stumbled, linked data will succeed

Linked data will triumph in this space because efforts to date focus less on the how and more on the why. RDF, SPARQL, OWL, and triple stores are onerous. URIs, micro-formats, RDFa, and JSON, less so. Why invest in difficult technologies if consumer outcomes can be realized with extant tools...
